name: pokemonScraper
description: Scrape data from Bulbapedia and save it to DynamoDB

scripts.deploy: rm -rf node_modules && npm install && rm -f package-lock.json && zip -r function.zip * && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name=getPokemonData --zip-file=fileb://function.zip --publish && rm all-by.zip

author: Dallas Slaughter
